DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study compare safety efficacy oral Xeloda , 5-fluorouracil combination leucovorin , patient undergo surgery colon cancer . Patients randomize receive either Xeloda 1250mg/m2 po bid day 1-14 every 21 day , leucovorin 20mg/m2 iv + 5-fluorouracil 425mg/m2 iv daily day 1 day 5 every 28 day . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 500+ individual .
